publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-941 Nick Johnston: Unrest at Glenochil Prison-That the Parliament notes with dismay the outbreak of unrest at Glenochil Prison in Clackmannanshire, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to initiate measures which will eradicate drugs as a feature in Scotland's prisons.
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) Bill Aitken*
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) Alex Fergusson*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-941 Nick Johnston: Unrest at Glenochil Prison-That the Parliament notes with dismay the outbreak of unrest at Glenochil Prison in Clackmannanshire, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to initiate measures which will eradicate drugs as a feature in Scotland's prisons. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Mr Keith Harding, Mr Brian Monteith, Phil Gallie*
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) David Mundell*
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) David McLetchie*

S1M-941 Nick Johnston: Unrest at Glenochil Prison—That the Parliament notes with dismay the outbreak of unrest at Glenochil Prison in Clackmannanshire, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to initiate measures which will eradicate drugs as a feature in Scotland’s prisons. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Mr Keith Harding, Mr Brian Monteith, Phil Gallie, David Mundell, David McLetchie

S1M-941 Nick Johnston: Unrest at Glenochil Prison—That the Parliament notes with dismay the outbreak of unrest at Glenochil Prison in Clackmannanshire, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to initiate measures which will eradicate drugs as a feature in Scotland’s prisons. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Mr Keith Harding, Mr Brian Monteith, Phil Gallie, David Mundell, David McLetchie
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) Mr Murray Tosh*, Alex Johnstone*, Miss Annabel Goldie*
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) Mr David Davidson*, Ben Wallace*, John Scott*, Mary Scanlon*

S1M-941 Nick Johnston: Unrest at Glenochil Prison—That the Parliament notes with dismay the outbreak of unrest at Glenochil Prison in Clackmannanshire, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to initiate measures which will eradicate drugs as a feature in Scotland’s prisons. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Mr Keith Harding, Mr Brian Monteith, Phil Gallie, David Mundell, David McLetchie, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Murray Tosh, Alex Johnstone, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mr David Davidson, Ben Wallace, John Scott, Mary Scanlon
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-941 Nick Johnston: Unrest at Glenochil Prison-That the Parliament notes with dismay the outbreak of unrest at Glenochil Prison in Clackmannanshire, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to initiate measures which will eradicate drugs as a feature in Scotland's prisons. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Mr Keith Harding, Mr Brian Monteith, Phil Gallie, David Mundell, David McLetchie, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Murray Tosh, Alex Johnstone, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mr David Davidson, Ben Wallace, John Scott, Mary Scanlon, Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-941 Unrest at Glenochil Prison (lodged on 2 June 2000) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*

S1M-941 Nick Johnston: Unrest at Glenochil Prison-That the Parliament notes with dismay the outbreak of unrest at Glenochil Prison in Clackmannanshire, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to initiate measures which will eradicate drugs as a feature in Scotland's prisons. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Mr Keith Harding, Mr Brian Monteith, Phil Gallie, David Mundell, David McLetchie, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Murray Tosh, Alex Johnstone, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mr David Davidson, Ben Wallace, John Scott, Mary Scanlon, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton
